hard_work_effort.quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.
hard_work_effort.author: Kevin Durant

hard_work_effort.quote: The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.
hard_work_effort.author: Vince Lombardi

hard_work_effort.quote: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. Until your good is better and your better is best.
hard_work_effort.author: Tim Duncan

hard_work_effort.quote: The harder you work, the harder it is to surrender.
hard_work_effort.author: Vince Lombardi

hard_work_effort.quote: Practice like you've never won. Play like you've never lost.
hard_work_effort.author: Anonymous

teamwork_collaboration.quote: Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence win championships.
teamwork_collaboration.author: Michael Jordan

teamwork_collaboration.quote: A basketball team is like the five fingers on your hand. If you can get them all together, you have a fist.
teamwork_collaboration.author: Mike Krzyzewski

teamwork_collaboration.quote: The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team.
teamwork_collaboration.author: Phil Jackson

teamwork_collaboration.quote: An assist makes two people happy. A point makes one guy happy.
teamwork_collaboration.author: Nikola Jokic

resilience_perseverance.quote: I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
resilience_perseverance.author: Michael Jordan

resilience_perseverance.quote: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
resilience_perseverance.author: Vince Lombardi

resilience_perseverance.quote: I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying.
resilience_perseverance.author: Michael Jordan

resilience_perseverance.quote: If you don't fall how are you going to know what getting up is like.
resilience_perseverance.author: Steph Curry

resilience_perseverance.quote: Every champion was once a contender who never gave up.
resilience_perseverance.author: Anonymous

confidence_self_belief.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
confidence_self_belief.author: Wayne Gretzky

confidence_self_belief.quote: The only person who can really motivate you is you.
confidence_self_belief.author: Shaquille O'Neal

confidence_self_belief.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
confidence_self_belief.author: Theodore Roosevelt

confidence_self_belief.quote: Whether you think you can or you can't, you're right.
confidence_self_belief.author: Henry Ford

confidence_self_belief.quote: Never say never because limits, like fears, are often just an illusion.
confidence_self_belief.author: Michael Jordan

fun_inspirational.quote: Basketball is a beautiful game when the five players on the court play with one heartbeat.
fun_inspirational.author: Anonymous

fun_inspirational.quote: Be the best version of yourself in anything that you do.
fun_inspirational.author: Stephen Curry

fun_inspirational.quote: The most important thing is to try and inspire people so that they can be great in whatever they want to do.
fun_inspirational.author: Kobe Bryant
